pkgmetadata.longdescription:
starlette-testclient


This is a backport of Starlette's `TestClient` using `requests` instead of `httpx`.The reason behind here is to give more time for people to migrate.## Installation```bashpip install starlette-testclient```## UsageYou just need to replace the import statement from:```pythonfrom starlette.testclient import TestClient```to:```pythonfrom starlette_testclient import TestClient```Easy, right? :sweat_smile:## LicenseThis project is licensed under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause license.
